forum.content:
-
Thelma: ok,then listen. Let's don't be caught.
Louise: What are you talking about?
Thelma: Let's keep going.
Louise: What do you mean?
Thelma: Go!
Louise: (smiling...) You sure?
Thelma: (smiling...) Yeah,yeah.
-
1991年的油門，踩在耳邊仍是令人心碎。「We can never know about tomorrow,But still we have to choose which way to go...」大概終有那個時候，你知道再也不能回頭了，粉身碎骨也得向前的覺悟。大概終有那個時候，生命落在哪便綻放在哪。
forum.title: 《Thelma & Louise》(中譯:末路狂花）
